Description: The Vialto HRIS team is primarily focused on supporting our new instance of Workday which went live in May 2023.We are looking for an experienced Workday Absence specialist with extensive experience of working across multiple territories. We need someone with proven ability to interpret and understand absence policies and translate those into robust absence plans leveraging best practice approaches.Vialto operates across 50 countries and has a varied and mixed absence policy landscape that has resulted in a complex and challenging configuration set up.Of key importance to this role, is the ability to not only configure absence plans in Workday, but work with HR and business stakeholders to fully understand the absence policies, interpret where necessary any legal requirements and formulate a simplified and efficient Workday absence set up. In addition, understanding or experience of interfacing Workday to time tracking systems such as Replicon would be very useful.Someone with prior experience as an Absence Lead or Absence SME in an HR function would be very beneficial.We are looking for a Workday Absence specialist to join the Vialto HRIS team to lead our global Absence configuration review and optimisation.Job Details
